techStack.title: Tech Stack
techStack.subtitle: The technologies that power Smart Study
techStack.react: For building our fast and interactive user interface.
techStack.nodejs: The engine of our backend, handling all server-side logic.
techStack.mongodb: Our flexible cloud database where your study data is securely stored.
techStack.tailwind: For crafting the modern, responsive design you see.
techStack.typescript: To ensure our code is robust, scalable, and error-free.
techStack.gemini: The powerful AI brain that generates your summaries and quizzes.
techStack.brevo: The service that reliably delivers important emails, like password resets.
techStack.tremor: To create the beautiful and insightful graphs on your Progress page.
